context_evidences: - Through these efforts, the Education Department says it has discharged or is in the process of discharging roughly $12.7 billion in student debt, affecting more than 638,000 borrowers. Reference: https://www.npr.org/2021/12/07/1062070001/student-loan-forgiveness-debt-president-biden-campaign-promise published on 2021-12-07 16:53:00

- And since then, Biden's Education Department has acted on those plans. In October, the department announced reforms to PSLF, one of which included a a limited-time waiver through October 31, 2022, that will allow borrowers to count payments from any federal-loan programs or repayment plans toward loan forgiveness through PSLF, including programs and plans that were not previously eligible. Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-debt-forgiveness-biden-campaign-promises-education-department-2021-6 published on 2022-01-20 16:41:39

- The Biden administration's approach to student loan relief began with improving, extending or expanding a handful of programs that were already on the books. Reference: https://www.npr.org/2021/12/07/1062070001/student-loan-forgiveness-debt-president-biden-campaign-promise published on 2021-12-07 16:53:00

- The president has canceled student debt for targeted groups of borrowers, like those defrauded by for-profit schools. Here's what Biden promised on student debt during his campaign, and where those promises currently stand: Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-debt-forgiveness-biden-campaign-promises-education-department-2021-6 published on 2022-01-20 16:41:39
correction_response:
This tweet is somewhat misleading. While Biden did campaign on forgiving undergraduate tuition-related federal student loan debt for certain borrowers, including those from public colleges and HBCUs earning up to $125,000 per year, he did not promise to cancel *all* federal student debt for these groups. He pledged to cancel at least $10,000 of student debt per person and has since acted on these plans, with the Education Department discharging or in the process of discharging roughly $12.7 billion in student debt. However, Biden's approach to student loan relief began with improving, extending, or expanding existing programs, not widespread debt cancellation. 
https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-debt-forgiveness-biden-campaign-promises-education-department-2021-6
https://www.npr.org/2021/12/07/1062070001/student-loan-forgiveness-debt-president-biden-campaign-promise
note_1_text: "Biden, as a presidential candidate, campaigned on student loan forgiveness of up to $10,000 for every borrower."    While Biden as a candidate did promise support for public colleges and HBCUs, he did not support specific debt relief for graduates of those schools.     https://www.forbes.com/sites/zackfriedman/2022/01/27/no-biden-didnt-promise-to-cancel-everyones-student-loans/
note_2_text: The complete text they took a passage from  https://medium.com/@JoeBiden/joe-biden-outlines-new-steps-to-ease-economic-burden-on-working-people-e3e121037322    He doesn’t have the authority to cancel debt by EO  https://www.forbes.com/sites/adamminsky/2021/07/28/pelosi-president-biden-does-not-have-power-to-cancel-student-loan-debt/

refute_evidences: - Biden dedicated funding to HBCUs in both his stimulus and infrastructure proposals, but didn't fund the wider forgiveness. Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-debt-forgiveness-biden-campaign-promises-education-department-2021-6 published on 2022-01-20 16:41:39

- Biden also campaigned on forgiving all undergraduate tuition-related federal student loan debt for borrowers from public colleges and universities earning up to $125,000 per year, and from private Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs) and minority-serving institutions. Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-debt-forgiveness-biden-campaign-promises-education-department-2021-6 published on 2022-01-20 16:41:39

- And he campaigned on doing more — again, $10,000 per borrower. Reference: https://www.npr.org/2021/12/07/1062070001/student-loan-forgiveness-debt-president-biden-campaign-promise published on 2021-12-07 16:53:00

- On the campaign trail, Biden had pledged to cancel at least $10,000 of student debt per person. Reference: https://www.npr.org/2021/12/07/1062070001/student-loan-forgiveness-debt-president-biden-campaign-promise published on 2021-12-07 16:53:00
tweet_text: A reminder that Biden ran on canceling *all* your federal student debt if you went to an HBCU or public college and make under $125k. That was the campaign trail.
